title: ASI Academy of Surfing Instructors
snippet:
Our client ASI (www.academyofsurfing.com) is the world’s leading professional membership organisation in the adventure sports industry in the specialist areas of surfing, stand up paddle and bodyboarding activities.  They provide training and accreditation services, for instructors, schools and clubs. They currently look after 200 schools around the world.

We are seeking a WEB/UI/APP DEVELOPER

1.  Design new look engaging main site https://www.academyofsurfing.com/

2. Develop on line appointment/class booking application. (see below short brief)

3. Redesign members area.

Our client wishes to provide a booking system to all of its schools.  This will allow web visitors to search a location in the world, find accredited school, view school profile, view available classes and time table and book a lesson.  The viewer would receive a confirmation email of the booking.  The local school can add booking via a admin system and also edit their profile. Each school would collect money via their own strip card account.  The main organisation would have all details of all registered users for mail shots, each user would have a profile about what lessons they have attended. After the lesson a user would receive a email asking to rate their experience.
